page.title: 16My family Life
page.content: I LIVE AT LITTLE DRY BROOK NEAR CLEMENTS END.I LIVE IN A HOUSE CALLED FAIRVIEW WITH MY MUM AND DAD AND MY BROTHER.WE HAVE A LOT OF ANIMALS GOATS,PIGS,SHEEP,DUCKS,CATS AND DOGS.WE FEED MOST OF THEM AT NIGHT AND MORNING ALL EXCEPT FOR THE CATS AND DOGS THEY HAVE FOOD WHEN EVER THEY WANT.I LIKE ANIMALS.I DISLIKE CABBAGE AND MUSHROOMS.I GET UP EVERY MORNING AT HALF PAST SEVEN AND GET READY FOR SCHOOL.WHEN I GET HOME I HAVE MY TEA AND WATCH T.V THEN I HELP MUM WITH THE ANIMALS.ABOUT NINE OR HALF PAST IGO TO BED.WE KEEP PIGS FOR MEAT AND WE TAKE THEM TO THE ABATTOIR.THE DUCKS WE KEEP FOR EGGS AND THE GOAT WE KEEP FOR MILK.WE BUY PIGS THEN TAKE THEM TO THE ABATTOIR.WE KEEP CATS AND DOGS BECAUSE WE LIKE THEM.
